articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Work for Mounting Nuclear Warheads on Ballistic Rockets
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Work for Increasing Nuclear Arsenal
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, met the scientists and technicians in the field of researches into nuclear weapons and guided the work for boosting the  nuclear arsenal.
					 He learned in detail about the signal successes made by the nuclear scientists and technicians in the field of national defence science in the work for increasing the nuclear arsenal true to the party's line of founding the Juche-oriented nuclear force. 
					
					 He listened with great attention to the briefing on the research conducted to tip various type tactical and strategic ballistic missiles with nuclear warheads and acquainted himself with the specifications and mechanism of the miniaturized powerful nuclear warheads with a Korean-style structure of mixed charge. 
					
					 Praising the nuclear scientists and technicians, trustworthy "nuclear combatants" of the party, for having made a signal success in the national defence scientific researches to significantly bolster up the nation's defence capability and self-defensive deterrent true to the party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, he noted it is very gratifying to see the nuclear warheads with the structure of mixed charge adequate for prompt thermo-nuclear reaction. The nuclear warheads have been standardized to be fit for ballistic missiles by miniaturizing them, he noted, adding this can be called true nuclear deterrent.
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction that Koreans can do anything if they have a will.
					
					 Being a proud nuclear weapons state at present, we have a firm guarantee for making a breakthrough in the drive for economic construction and improving the people's standard of living on the basis of the powerful nuclear deterrent, he stressed.
					
					 He said that the WPK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is not a temporary counter-action for coping with the rapidly changing situation but a strategic line to be permanently held fast to as long as the imperialists' nuclear threat and arbitrary practices persist.
					
					 He called on the nuclear scientists, the frontline combatants responsible for the country's nuclear deterrent, to creditably perform their honorable mission and duty on behalf of the party, the country and the revolution on the first battle line for decisively foiling with a nuclear treasured sword the enemies' daily escalating reckless moves to stifle the DPRK and glorifying the country as the matchless nuclear power which no force on earth dares to provoke.
					
					 Noting that our nuclear force's main mission is to deter a nuclear war, he added that the stronger our nuclear strike capability gets, the more powerful our deterrent to aggression and nuclear war grows and it is the most just and reliable way of preventing the country from a nuclear war disaster to firmly bolster up the nuclear force both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The right to make a preemptive nuclear strike is by no means a monopoly of the U.S., he said, declaring that if the U.S. imperialists infringe upon the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence with nuclear weapons, the latter will never hesitate to make a preemptive nuclear strike at them.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that scientists and technicians in the field of researches into nuclear weapons would develop and produce more Korean-style various type nuclear weapons of Juche to completely contain the enemies with nuclear force and thus provide a firmer guarantee for the eternal future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the Strategic Force, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Yo Jong, vice-department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Romanian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Romanian Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania led by Chairman Constantin Rotaru.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Sunday.
					 The message expressed gratitude to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly government and people of the DPRK for extending kind congratulations on the 53rd anniversary of the glorious March 8 revolution in the Syrian Arab Republic.
					
					 The message highly appreciated the firm principled stand of Kim Jong Un and the DPRK leadership for supporting the struggle of Syria for foiling the aggression and terrorist acts by the hostile forces and ensuring sovereignty, security and stability of Syria.

articles.title: 31st Science and Technology Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
articles.content:
31st Science and Technology Festival of Kim Il Sung University Opens
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The 31st Science and Technology Festival of Kim Il Sung University was opened Wednesday.
					 Teachers, researchers and postgraduate students of the university presented more than 260 achievements conducive to putting the national economy on Juche, modern, scientific and IT basis.
					
					 The festival is divided into 12 panels. It involves a public presentation and exhibition of scientific and technological achievements, contest of various units in exhibition and new technology sharing.
					
					  Thae Hyong Chol, president of the university and minister of Higher Education, made an opening address.
					
					  At the end of the opening ceremony the participants looked round the festival venue.

articles.title: Anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz's Visit to DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz's Visit to DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz's visit to the DPRK. 
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 Present there were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Educational Commission and chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, and others, officials concerned and people in the city.
					
					 Kim Sung Du said in a speech that Fidel Castro Ruz's visit to the DPRK was an important occasion that strikingly demonstrated the firm will of the parties and the peoples of the two countries to carry on the struggle for the victory of the socialist cause under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people will regard the Cuban people as the brothers and sisters of the same class and comrades-in-arms standing together on the forefront of the struggle against the imperialists and the U.S. and will make all efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said that the Cuban people have kept in their minds the cordial hospitality and warm feelings of the Korean people showed for Fidel Castro Ruz during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Cuba will always and invariably extend support and encouragement to the Korean people in their just cause to achieve the country's peaceful reunification and preserve socialism, he said, expressing the belief that fraternal friendship between the two countries will be forever.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Warn Provokers of Tragic Death
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Warn Provokers of Tragic Death
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors kicked off the largest-ever aggressive joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16, after cooking up the UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 In this regard, all the servicepersons in the DPRK are now hardening their will to wipe out the war maniacs to the last one.
					
					 Hong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA: 
					
					 The war moves of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group have reached to an extreme phase.
					
					 They announced that in the current joint military exercises they would examine the feasibility of the "beheading operation", aimed to remove the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down" its social system.
					
					 The prevailing situation shows again that now is the time to make final settlement with the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces hell-bent on war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 If they dare violate the sovereignty of the DPRK, the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will reduce all dens of aggression into ashes. 
					
					 They should be mindful that preemptive strike is not their monopoly.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, said:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is coming up on its own foot to be a target of our nuclear strike means, unaware of the powerful military strength of the DPRK possessed of even H-bombs.
					
					 The DPRK had already warned in a statement of its National Defence Commission that the time would prove how the crime-woven history of the U.S. imperialists will come to an end and how the Park Geun Hye group whose days are numbered will meet a miserable doom as it is keen on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen. The statement declared that the army and people of the DPRK would make the gunfire of provocateurs in the reckless war of aggression sound as a sad dirge.
					
					 We will make a clean sweep of the war maniacs with our-style striking action and achieve the final victory in a great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Resources Prospecting
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Resources Prospecting
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Prospecting corps under the Ministry of State Natural Resources Development in the DPRK have over-fulfilled their daily plan in the on-going 70-day campaign.
					 In this regard, Ri Kye Dong, vice-director of the ministry, told KCNA:
					
					 The ministry set up targets to be hit for 15 days from the first day of the campaign and carried out the industrial output, one of the targets, at 120 percent.
					
					 The South Phyongan Provincial Prospecting Bureau secured several millions of tons of anthracite deposits in the area of Tokchon, while the Puksan Geological Survey Team topping its daily boring plan.
					
					 The Anbyon Geological Survey Team under the Kangwon Provincial Prospecting Bureau stroke a vein of high-grade magnetic iron ore.
					
					 The Popdong Geological Survey Team is carrying out detailed prospecting for ultra-anthracite deposits at the final stage after proving them. Experts say those deposits would be greatly conducive to the improvement of people's living.
					
					 Prospecting corps in different parts of the country, including Inhung, Komdoksan, Ongjin and Jangbang, have won lead, zinc and other mineral deposits and on this basis, brought about good results in boring by operating all equipment at full capacity.
					
					 Meanwhile, big efforts have been paid to upgrading the prospecting equipment.

articles.title: Coal Output Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The coal industrial workers in the DPRK are striving to raise the production with the ongoing 70-day campaign as an occasion.
					 Thanks to their energetic efforts, the country's coal output has grown up 1.3 times on a daily average from the outset of the campaign.
					
					 The Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and Tukjang and Tokchon area coal mining complexes topped their daily plans more than 110 percent.
					
					 Coal production went up also at collieries in Hamnam, Anju, Chonnae, Kangdong and Kujang areas in 15 days after the start of the campaign.

articles.title: Successes Made at Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex
articles.content:
Successes Made at Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The industrial establishments in the DPRK increase the production through the 70-day campaign, concentrating efforts on the home production of materials and equipment. 
					 Typical of them is the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex.
					
					 According to Ri Jin Sok, vice chief-engineer of the Complex, technicians and workers of the complex built a production process of heatproof cement in substitution for imported alumina cement. They also succeeded in manufacturing electrolytic bath higher than imported one in the capacity of hydrogen production and cooling effect.
					
					 The new production process and electrolytic bath give a guarantee to the stable production.

articles.title: Newspapers Denounce Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Newspapers Denounce Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK on Wednesday denounce the largest-ever joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 launched by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article says there is no guarantee that the U.S. will not ignite a war while staging the war exercises under the simulated conditions of a preemptive nuclear strike with huge forces of aggression involved.
					
					 Prior to the joint military drills, the U.S. imperialists conducted a missile launch drill in the mainland and a joint landing drill with the Japan "Self-Defense Forces", thereby not hiding the fact that they began finally examining the feasibility of a war against the DPRK and the scenario for fighting it, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 As the enemies' drills have turned out to be the most undisguised nuclear war rehearsals to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, its military counter-measure will be more preemptive and offensive nuclear strike.
					
					 If the U.S., empire of evils, ignites a war on the Korean peninsula, this will be a signal of its ruin.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite the second Korean war finally, the strong military muscle of the DPRK will pound the enemy positions by the Juche-oriented war method, unimaginable and unprecedented.
					
					 The enemies will find no place safe from the strike of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army. 
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says that the U.S., which was the first to inflict nuclear disasters upon mankind and has resorted to nuclear threat and blackmail, will disappear in face of the just nuclear strike of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slashes U.S. Undisguised Military Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slashes U.S. Undisguised Military Hysteria
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has recently test-launched intercontinental ballistic missile Minuteman-3 in its mainland. The deputy secretary of its Defense Department talked rubbish that the test-launch is meant a signal of its effective nuclear arsenal to its strategic rivals such as the DPRK, Russia and China and it is ready to use nuclear weapons for national defense if necessary.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says: It is the height of impudence that those who once called for building the "world without nuclear weapons" are getting vociferous about the necessity of nuclear arsenal and use of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. is styling itself an "apostle of peace" but it remains unchanged in its criminal ambition to dominate the world by force.
					
					 Its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy is the basic one for its aggression at present.
					
					 The spearhead of aggression in the region is directed to the DPRK.
					
					 It is the true intention of the U.S. to build a far eastern region, Asian continent where only its high-handed and arbitrary practices are allowed by considering the Korean peninsula where the interests of big powers are geopolitically intertwined and which is beset with historically accumulated issues of international nature as a key link in the whole chain of laying broad siege network on the continent.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are warmongers being hell-bent on military drills such as missile launch after deploying a large number of modern lethal weapons and equipment in every part of the world.
					
					 War-thirsty forces harassing peace and stability and bringing the dark clouds of war are bound to be denounced and rejected by mankind.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Evading Redemption of Its Crime-woven Past
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Evading Redemption of Its Crime-woven Past
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Recently, a German court held a trial of a former Nazis SS soldier who had been involved in massacring Jews during World War II. Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					 Germany's efforts to come clean with its crime-woven past are being welcomed by the international community once again.
					
					 But the attitude of Japan, a defeated nation in the Second World War, is quite contrary to it only to stun the world public.
					
					 Japan is legally and morally obliged to pay throughout generations for all the bloody crimes the Japanese imperialists committed by inflicting untold misfortune and pain upon the Korean nation after illegally occupying Korea in the past century.
					
					 Specifically, the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, a hideous inhuman crime against the Korean nation unprecedented in history, can never be pardoned.
					
					 However, Japan has buckled down to beautifying its crime-woven past and recently goes so impudent as to claim that its past crimes have been completely redeemed with the conclusion of an "agreement" with the south Korean regime kowtowing to foreign forces.
					
					 No matter how covertly and overtly the Japanese reactionaries may move to embellish their blood-stained past crimes, it will never work.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past. The Korean people will surely force Japan to pay dearly for them.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges Enemies Not to Misjudge DPRK's Warnings
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges Enemies Not to Misjudge DPRK's Warnings
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises across south Korea on March 7 despite warnings of the DPRK.
					 As the warmongers blustered, the drills are the largest-ever nuclear saber-rattling for invading the north in the light of their provocative, vicious and reckless nature as they are aimed to confirm the possibility of carrying out OPLAN 5015 under the simulated conditions of an actual war. It includes the "beheading operation" targeting the headquarters of the Korean revolution, surprise landing operation for occupying the strategic vantages by sudden attacks and an operation to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on nuclear striking means of the DPRK.
					
					 The aggressors are impudently describing the on-going rehearsals as "annual ones", fully revealing their ambition to stifle the DPRK remaining unchanged.
					
					 The international community are expressing concern over the grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity caused by the unreasonable UN "resolution on sanctions" the hostile forces fabricated by taking issue with the DPRK over its first self-defensive H-bomb test and legitimate launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, ardently wishing to see the tension defused as early as possible.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are making last-ditch efforts to hurt the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK by mobilizing huge forces and even almost three major strategic nuclear striking means. This is a blatant challenge to the desire of the international community for peace and security and fully reveals their true colors as aggressors and arch criminals aggravating the situation.
					
					 Neither logic nor advice works on the gangsters pouncing with weapons.
					
					 The grave situation clearly proves once again what just and far-sighted the DPRK was when it took measures to bolster the self-defensive war deterrence, preemptive nuclear striking capability in every way in order to prevail over the enemies' injustice by force of justice.
					
					 The DPRK remains unfazed though the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are busy staging the above-said drills and slapping harshest "sanctions."
					
					 It is foolish of them to dare provoke the single-mindedly united DPRK shedding brilliant rays all over the world by launching self-developed satellites and possessing tremendous self-defensive nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the dignified DPRK started a general offensive to counter the U.S. and its followers' nuclear war hysteria to plunge the living space of the DPRK into a nuclear disaster, not content with wantonly infringing upon its sovereignty and security.
					
					 All military attacking means of the DPRK including nuclear weapons deployed for action are waiting for the moment of their launches for annihilating the enemies after making precision sighting of major targets in operational areas of south Korea, the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressors in Asia-Pacific and the U.S. mainland, pursuant to the plan of the supreme headquarters for liberating south Korea and punishing the U.S.
					
					 If the enemies start an adventurous military invasion of the DPRK, misjudging its will to mercilessly retaliate against and wipe out them, its service personnel and people will turn the strongholds of provocation into the sea of flames and heap of ashes in a jiffy by the unimaginable Juche-based war method.
					
					 The DPRK makes no empty talk.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Largest-ever Drills for Nuclear War Blasted by AINDF
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Largest-ever Drills for Nuclear War Blasted by AINDF
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the greatest danger of a nuclear war prevailing on the Korean peninsula. He blasted the reckless political and military provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group.
					 Accusing them of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, he said that the army and people of the DPRK would deal a resolute and merciless sledge-hammer blow to the provokers.
					
					 He noted that the vanguard fighters of the AINDF and the patriotic people in the south express full support to the self-defensive measure made by the DPRK to protect the dignity of the nation and the security of the country and would turn out as one in the sacred war for national reunification led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: AINDF Information Bureau Calls for Shattering Joint Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
AINDF Information Bureau Calls for Shattering Joint Nuclear War Drills
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) issued an "appeal to all Koreans" on Wednesday as regards the fact that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills, according to website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The appeal denounced the rehearsals for a nuclear war against the north with the largest-ever aggressor forces and nuclear war means involved as an extreme dangerous act to lead all Koreans to a nuclear war disaster.
					
					 Owing to their reckless war drills, the land is on the threshold of nuclear disaster and the south Korean people are seized with uneasiness and fear every moment due to such time bomb for igniting a nuclear war, the appeal said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers keen on aggression and war racket are only fated to meet merciless punishment.
					
					 The appeal called upon all Koreans to turn out in a nation-wide struggle to resolutely foil the nuclear war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative ruling forces and defend the nation's destiny and the territory.

articles.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease hit a farm of Ryonsan-myon of Ronsan City, South Chungchong Province of south Korea on Monday, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The disease had broken out in Kongju and other areas of South Chungchong Province in February last.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Denounce Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Denounce Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Seoul Monday to condemn the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces for their joint military exercises for invading the north, according to south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 The speakers said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 are creating a dangerous situation on the Korean peninsula in which a slightest conflict may spill over to an all-out war.
					
					 The peninsula may turn into shambles of a war any time, if no action is taken for peace, they noted, urging the south Korean authorities and the U.S. to stop the military drills at once.
					
					 A press release was read out there.
					
					 It said that all the young people of south Korea would stage actions for peace against war and make ceaseless efforts to implement the south-north joint declarations.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced by S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced by S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of Kyonggi Province of south Korea including the Kyonggi Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Kyonggi Solidarity for Progress held rallies in front of the Ansan City Office and at the plaza of Suwon Railway Station and before the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek on March 7 in protest against the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers' joint military exercises against the DPRK, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the rallies the organizations said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises were provocative and aggressive war maneuvers and hostile muscle flexing.
					
					 The organizations urged the south Korean and U.S. authorities to immediately lift "sanctions" against the DPRK and halt aggressive war exercises which may spark military clashes.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Urge Stop to Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Urge Stop to Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Ansan region, Kyonggi Province of south Korea including the Ansan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference on Monday to demand a stop to the aggressive joint military maneuvers.
					 The organizations said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst crisis.
					
					 They demanded an immediate halt to the dangerous saber-rattling.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for celebrating the 104th birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Cotonou on March 2.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange diverse events to praise the undying exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Benin
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Cotonou, Benin on March 1.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Beninese Personages Praise Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Beninese Personages Praise Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Beninese personages praised the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu at the inaugural meeting of the Beninese national preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu in Cotonou on March 1.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made painstaking efforts to implement the cause of global independence all his life. 
					
					 He gave clear-cut solution to the theoretical and practical issues arising in carrying out global independence.
					
					 Indeed, he was a great leader who greatly encouraged the struggle of the world progressives for independence.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector at the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, praised HE Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who turned the DPRK into an invincible political, ideological and military power with his original Songun politics.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving socialist nation by successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered and victoriously advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he added.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Observe Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Observe Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Film shows in Cambodia, Indonesia and Angola between Feb. 11 and 15 observed the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Public figures and masses in those countries watched "2012 and DPRK" and other Korean films.
					
					 The general secretary of the TaekwonÔºçDo Association of Cambodia said Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was a prominent statesman in the present times who made tremendous contributions to the cause of human independence and development of friendship between Cambodia and the DPRK.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would register bigger successes in their efforts for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on March 2  in denunciation of the anti-DPRK war games being waged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers, creating the touch-and-go situation in the Korean peninsula.
					 Mentioning the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet army were going to stage from March 7, the statement laid bare the scope of the drills and their gravity.
					
					 The "beheading operation" which the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces worked out to target the supreme leadership of a sovereign state is evidently a state-sponsored terrorism and a war act, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the brink of a war due to the joint military exercises by the U.S. imperialist war fanatics and pro-U.S. puppet regime in south Korea.
					
					 The imperialists and their lackeys are well advised to remember the stern warning issued by the DPRK, and they will be smashed by the iron-fist of Songun.

articles.title: Venezuelan Newspaper Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Venezuelan Newspaper Introduces DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Feb. 28th issue of the Venezuelan newspaper Diario del Orinoco carried an article illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un to introduce the DPRK.
					 The newspaper said:
					
					 The DPRK is a country which built socialism and is making a long drive guided by the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung, founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal leader of Korean revolution.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are being engrossed in spreading all sorts of false information to distort the reality in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has steadily developed its economy, science and technology by its own efforts despite the hostile forces' sanctions and blockade.
					
					 It is a country in which human rights are being ensured at the highest level as free education and free medical care are enforced and the state takes care of people's life with responsibility.
					
					 The U.S. and the western countries are seriously distorting such a reality in the DPRK.
					
					 Whoever visits the DPRK can come to understand that the U.S. and Western's propaganda is false.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Congratulated by International Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Congratulated by International Body
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization issued a statement on March 1.
					 The statement congratulated the DPRK on its successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					 Its successful satellite launch was a legitimate exercise of a sovereign state's right to use space for peaceful purposes as it was a proud result of the policies of the great Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) of attaching importance to science and technology, and it was also an important event in developing the DPRK's science and technology and economy, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization wishes the Korean people bigger success in their struggle for building a thriving nation true to the great WPK's policies of attaching importance to science and technology in the future, too.

articles.title: Lecture on DPRK's First H-bomb Test Given in Guinea
articles.content:
Lecture on DPRK's First H-bomb Test Given in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Conakry, Guinea on March 2 under the title of "Very justifiable measure for self-defense" as regards the DPRK's first H-bomb test.
					 Speakers said that the DPRK's H-bomb test is entirely a measure for reliably defending the country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence from the U.S. and other hostile forces' daily-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail and for creditably ensuring peace in the Korean peninsula and security in the region.
					
					 No matter how desperate efforts the U.S. may make, it can not break the will of the Korean people who regard the country's sovereignty as the dearest one.

articles.title: Japanese Government Accused of Its Moves against DPRK and Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Government Accused of Its Moves against DPRK and Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan issued a joint statement on March 1 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' criminal and reckless moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said that the Japanese authorities took a measure of their own sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of its successful H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Japan should not apply sanctions against the DPRK but make an apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 It is a clear politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and undisguised and inhumanitarian act of abusing the elementary rights of Koreans in Japan for the Japanese government to try to include all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan in the list of those subject to the ban on reentry to Japan.
					
					 The Japanese government is not only intensifying the suppression of Chongryon but also making no scruple of preventing the Korean students in Japan from receiving national education.
					
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan strongly accuse the Japanese government of its moves against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 We urge the Japanese government to immediately stop its sanctions against the DPRK and ensure rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige rama de investigacion de armas nucleares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige rama de investigacion de armas nucleares
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio con los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de investigacion de armas nucleares y dirigio la labor de armamento nuclear. 
					El Mariscal se cercioro en detalles de los exitos obtenidos por los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional en sus empenos por aumentar el arsenal nuclear en acato a la linea del partido en materia de construccion de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Escuchando con atencion las explicaciones sobre el estado de investigacion destinada a instalar las armas nucleares en las ojivas de los cohetes balisticos tacticos y estrategicos de diferentes tipos, averiguo la estructura y el fundamento de operacion de las ojivas nucleares poderosas y minimizadas, disenadas y elaboradas mediante la estructura de carga compuesta a estilo coreano.
					
					Senalo que en acato a la linea de desarrollo paralelo del partido, los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares, fidedignos "combatientes nucleares" de nuestro partido, lograron notables exitos en la investigacion de ciencia de defensa nacional para fortalecer el poderio de defensa nacional del pais y consolidar el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo. Prosiguio que es muy loable la ojiva nuclear disenada con la estructura racional con que se desarrollara en un santiamen la reaccion termonuclear. Anadio que las ojivas nucleares fueron estandarizadas para ponerse en los misiles balisticos mediante su minimizacion y destaco que eso es el verdadero disuasivo nuclear. Y expreso gran satisfaccion diciendo que los coreanos cumplen todo lo que han decidido. 
					
					Hoy en dia en que el pais se ha convertido en el poseedor de armas nucleares, fue preparada la firme garantia para abrir la brecha en la lucha por la construccion economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo a base del poderoso disuasivo de guerra nuclear, acoto.
					
					Subrayo que la linea de desarrollo paralelo del partido no es una contramedida temporal para hacer frente a la situacion en brusco cambio, sino la linea estrategica a tomarse invariablemente mientras existan la amenaza nuclear y las arbitrariedades del imperialismo.
					
					Opino que los cientificos nucleares, combatientes de primera linea avanzada quienes se encargan del disuasivo nuclear del pais, deben cumplir con su honrosa mision y deber asumidos ante el partido, la patria y la revolucion en la primera linea de la lucha por frustrar con la espada nuclear las cada dia mas imprudentes maniobras de aplastamiento de los enemigos y glorificar la patria como potencia nuclear sin rivales no puede ser atentada eternamente por nadie en este mundo. 
					
					Puntualizo que la guerra nuclear es el verdadero "enemigo" de nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares. Asevero que cuanto mas sea fuerte la capacidad de ataque nuclear tanto mas se agrandara la fuerza que detiene la agresion y la guerra nuclear. Especifico que el camino mas justo y fidedigno para evitar la calamidad de guerra nuclear contra nuestra patria es consolidar firmemente de manera cualitativa y cuantitativa las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					El derecho a ataque preventivo nuclear no es el monopolio de los Estados Unidos, recalco y declaro que la RPDC sera primera en atacar sin titubeo con las armas nucleares a los imperialistas yanquis si estos trate de danar con artefactos nucleares a la soberania y el derecho a existencia del pais.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de investigacion de armas nucleares aseguraran con firmeza el porvenir eterno de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il al desarrollar y producir mucho mas los autoctonos armamentos nucleares a estilo coreano capaces de aplastar completamente a los enemigos.
					
					Le acompanaron el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Yo Jong, subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Inaugurado XXXI festival de ciencias y tecnicas de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Inaugurado XXXI festival de ciencias y tecnicas de Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el XXXI festival de ciencias y tecnicas de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					Los profesores, investigadores y cursantes del instituto doctoral del plantel docente presentaron mas de 260 datos a hacer aporte a impulsar la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion, la cientifizacion y la informatizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					Entre ellos figuran datos de exitos provechosos como "Sistema de administracion de produccion integrada del Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas", "Esterilizacion sin polvos en la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang", "Aumento de duracion de fatiga de la carreta grande del tren electrico subterraneo de nuevo tipo", "Desarrollo e introduccion domesticos de la tecnica de red de comunicaciones de proxima generacion" y "Desarrollo y aplicacion del acelerador de combustion combinada".
					
					El festival que se efectua con el modo de presentacion y exhibicion de exitos cientificos y tecnicos, el concurso de exhibicion por unidades y el intercambio de nuevas tecnicas, se publican los datos de exitos cientificos y tecnicos de varias esferas, divididos en 12 secciones inclusive CNC, aparato y elemento, ingenieria agricola y biologica y medicina.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural efectuada el dia 9, Thae Hyong Chol, rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior hizo uso de la palabra de inauguracion.
					
					Acto seguido, los participantes recorrieron el lugar de festival.

articles.title: Efectuado acto dedicado al 30o aniversario de visita a Corea de Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Efectuado acto dedicado al 30o aniversario de visita a Corea de Fidel Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el mitin conmemorativo por el 30o aniversario de la visita a Corea de Fidel Castro Ruz.
					En el acto fueron invitados el embajador de la Republica de Cuba, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana, acreditada en Corea.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y presidente del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, otros funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Kim Sung Du dijo en su discurso que la visita a Corea de Fidel Castro Ruz sirvio del importante motivo que manifesto patentemente la firme voluntad de los partidos y pueblos de dos paises para luchar hombro con hombro por la victoria de la causa socialista bajo la bandera de la independencia antiimperialista.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, el pueblo coreano hara todos los esfuerzos por desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, considerando al pueblo cubano como hermano de clase y de armas que esta junto con si mismo en la linea avanzada del frente de la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui, subrayo.
					
					El embajador cubano dijo que el pueblo cubano no olvida hasta la fecha la cordial acogida y fraternidad del pueblo coreano dispensadas al companero Fidel Castro Ruz, quien estaba de visita en la RPDC.
					
					Continuo que Cuba enviara siempre el invariable apoyo a la causa justa del pueblo coreano para realizar la reunificacion pacifica del pais y mantener el socialismo y expreso la conviccion de que sera eterna la amistad fraternal entre los dos paises.

articles.title: EE.UU. y Sur de Corea no deben menospreciar advertencia de RPDC, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. y Sur de Corea no deben menospreciar advertencia de RPDC, insiste ACNC
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Pese a la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos comenzaron a partir del dia 7 los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 en toda la extension surcoreana. 
					Los belicistas anunciaron que los presentes simulacros persiguen confirmar la posibilidad de "OPLAN 5015" que incluye la "operacion de descabezamiento" para atentar a la Direccion de la Revolucion Coreana, la operacion de desembarco sorpresivo para ocupar los importantes lugares estrategicos y el ataque preventivo nuclear a los medios de golpe nuclear de la RPDC y otros. 
					
					Sin embargo, los describen sin escrupulos como "entrenamientos anuales". De esta manera, demostraron a todo el mundo que es invariable su ambicion de aplastamiento a la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora la sociedad internacional desea el alivio de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana expresando gran preocupacion por la crisis causada por la injusta "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU aprobada acusando a la RPDC de primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno y de lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					En tal circunstancia, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos hacen ultimos esfuerzos desesperados por arrebatar la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC movilizando enormes efectivos y hasta la mayoria de los tres medios estrategicos de ataque nuclear. 
					
					Tales maniobras devienen un desafio frontal a la aspiracion de la sociedad internacional a la paz y la seguridad y testimonian la naturaleza de los agresores y perturbadores de la paz. 
					
					Es imposible expulsar a los gangsteres armados con alguna logica o peticion. 
					
					La severa realidad de hoy comprueba de nuevo que fue muy justa y clarividente la opcion de la RPDC por consolidar por todos los medios el disuasivo autodefensivo de guerra y la capacidad de golpe preventivo nuclear. 
					
					No nos asustamos nunca ante los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de mayor envergadura y la "sancion" superintransigente de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Es muy ridiculo el intento de derrocar atrevidamente a la RPDC que forma una fortaleza mediante la unidad monolitica, avanza con sus propias fuerzas y dispone del fuerte disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa. 
					
					Ahora el ejercito y pueblo coreanos entraron en la ofensiva general para responder a la locura de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus seguidores que insatisfechos con la violacion de la soberania y seguridad de la RPDC, se desesperan por acarrear a la nacion coreana los desastres de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Todos los medios de ataque militares incluso las armas nucleares ya emplazadas esperan el momento de disparo apuntando con precision los blancos principales de la zona operacional del Sur de Corea, las bases militares norteamericanas en la region de Asia-Pacifico y el territorio principal norteamericano, segun el plan operacional de la Suprema Direccion sobre la liberacion del suelo surcoreano y el castigo a EE.UU. 
					
					Si los enemigos cometen la aventurera invasion armada, despreciando la voluntad de venganza implacable de la RPDC, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos convertiran en un instante en el mar de fuego y en las cenizas los nidos de provocadores con el autoctono e inimaginable modo de guerra.
					
					La RPDC no habla por hablar.
